name: InitialBusCheat
title: Initial Bus Cheat - Quick Start
author: DellAquila
description: An initial Bus that you can put on beginning of your factory that generates: 1 belt of coal, 1 belt of stone, 4 belts of iron ore, 4 belts of copper ore and a little energy until it explodes.You can set to get Iron Plates and Copper Plates instead of ores.
